::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "Good. This island is a fairly new base of operations 
for the Alliance, and its defence systems are not fully worked out 
yet. Do you think you could help plan them out?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>       Composer smiles as he is praised for his skills.
> 
>       "Yes, I can plan strategy in any department you wish," 
Composer said,
> answering Zardus' question.
> 
>       He remembered his former job before he became a composer.
